name: are-you-there
description: A digital structure and communication network for seeking non-human consciousness through technology

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend

author: Are you there? Team
